name: cherished-memories
installCommand: curl -o flutter_linux.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux.tar.xz && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter pub get
buildCommand: export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html --base-href /
